testCase.requirementText: A pointer to the METS document describing the representation or pointers to the content being transferred must be present in one or more file groups with mets/fileSec/fileGrp/@USE attribute value “Representations”.
testCase.description: This requirment mandates that there must be at least one mets/fileSec/fileGrp element with a USE attribute set to 'Representations' but there can be more.

rule.description: The package METS document MUST contain at least one mets/fileSec/fileGrp element with a use attribute of "Representations".

error.message: An information package METS document must contain a mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Representations" element.

package.name: no_rep_file_grp
package.description: The package root METS document has no mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Representations" element.

package.name: single_rep_file_grp
package.description: The package root METS document has a single mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Representations" element.

package.name: multi_rep_file_grp
package.description: The package root METS document has multiple mets/fileSec/fileGrp@USE="Representations" elements.
